hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah said:"We went out with the Messenger of Allah not thinking of anything but Hajj. When we drew close to Makkah, the Messenger of Allah ordered: 'Whoever has a Hadi with him should remain in Ihram, and whoever does not have a Hadi with him, he should exit Ihram

chapter.ara-name: باب إِبَاحَةِ فَسْخِ الْحَجِّ بِعُمْرَةٍ لِمَنْ لَمْ يَسُقِ الْهَدْىَ .
chapter.eng-name: It Is Permissible To Cancel Hajj And Do 'Umrah Instead If One Has Not Brought A Hadi
